item.title: Download books from IRC
item.author: Shadow Libraries
item.description: Getting books from IRC Channels Guide made for the Shadow Libraries website a while ago. What’s IRC? Internet Relay Chat (IRC) is an application layer protocol that facilitates communication in the form of text. The chat process works on a client/server networking model. IRC clients are computer programs that users can install on their system or web based applications running either locally in the browser or on a 3rd party server.
